creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
I think it depends on your OS and which OS the source distribution has been created
on.  The tests are known to work both on Unix and Windows when using CVS directly.

I'm not sure what we want to do here (exclude some files from the fixcrlf in the
src-dist, probably.

The fixcrlf test should work in 1.5.2 now.

The CommandLineJavaTest is trickier as we have junit.jar in CVS but don't
distribute it as part of the source release.  We'll better try a different test
here.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text: All tests should pass in the source distribution of 1.6beta2 now.
